p: The light-saturated photosynthetic rates (μmol CO 2 m −2 s −1) of mature leaves were measured (LI-COR LI- 6400, LI-COR Inc., Lincoln, NE, USA), according to AbdElgawad et al. [ 23]. Dark respiration was determined as the absolute CO 2 exchange rate determined at photosynthetic photon flux density (μmolm −2 s −1).
